## gk workspace clone

Clone a workspace

### Synopsis


Clone all repositories of a cloud workspace to your local machine.


```
gk workspace clone [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  gk ws clone <name> <root-path>
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for clone
```
